title: Who We Are - Badia
text: Our Story Badia Spices has been bringing families and flavors together for more than 50 years. What started in a small Miami garage with Joseph “Pepe” Badía and his father has grown into a global brand found in over 80 countries and trusted by 130+ customers worldwide. From our early days delivering to local bodegas, Badia has expanded into a nationwide presence across major retailers, e-commerce, distributors, and even cruise lines—becoming an iconic American brand rooted in over six decades of flavor leadership. Quality and food safety remain at the heart of everything we do. Our rigorous certifications, advanced in-house lab testing, and reliable global sourcing network ensure exceptional flavor, consistency, and value—batch after batch. From spices and blends to olive oils, organics, teas, and hot sauces, Badia continues to inspire creativity in the kitchen, bringing great flavor to life one dish at a time.
